right.text: So I put him in a headlock then slammed his chair to the floor :-)

left.text: Today at lunch this guy at my table kept making jokes about me.

right.text: I'd probably kick gofer's ass for no reason :-)

left.text: You don't wanna meet me in real life.

right.text: And for some reason I don't think gofer can fight.

left.text: Apollyon knows I'm just a big bottle of rage.
